name: Pressat
overview:
Pressat is a dynamic communications tool connecting businesses, brands and organisations with the media so you can tell your story to the world.

Also more familiarly known as a press release distribution service, Pressat is fresh, exciting and takes a modern twist to spreading news by harnessing the power of multiple forms of media.

TV, Radio, Magazines and Newspapers are all traditional methods of getting publicity but Pressat goes one step further by combining social media with the traditional aspects to reach a wider customer base.

Pressat works will all manor of businesses from major household brands to startups across the UK.

Benefits of Pressat

Low cost in comparison to competitors. Pay as you go pricing. Great for search visibility. Target many forms of media.

offices.address1: Studio 216, 2nd Floor, Hope Mill, 113 Pollard Street
